data.name: Quest: Escape Dungeon
data.detailed_description:
From a long time ago, there was a tale of a mystical cave full of treasures. Many brave souls went for the quest to find it, but none of them return.
Three friends decide to try the luck to find the cave. But they do not know that a road to cave is full of deadly traps and fearful guardians.
Help young adventurers to find the cave, solve all puzzles, defeat cave guardians, steal cave treasures and get back home safely.
Good luck on your journey!

Features:
* Logical puzzles
* Turn-based JRPG styled combat.
* Three heroes.
* Quick and slick save\load system.
* Pixel graphics.
* Atmospheric OST.
* Achievements.
* Keyboard and mouse control.

data.short_description: Join the group of adventurers in the quest for treasures! Solve puzzles and fight the dungeon guards to find the cave full of gold and get back home safely.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows
  • Processor: Intel Celeron 1800 MHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 550 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard, Mouse
